Development of Hybrid Infrastructures
abstract: ‘Sponge cities’ are urban areas with abundant natural areas such as trees, lakes and parks or other designs intended to absorb rainwater. As climate change brings increasing flood threats, cities need to be designed like giant sponges that allow water to drain away safely.
